item.title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Has Mined An Entire Bitcoin Block Worth $300K
item.description:

item.title: Alabama Man Pleads Guilty to SEC X Account Hack and Fake Bitcoin ETF Post
item.description:
Eric Council Jr. has pleaded guilty to conspiracy charges in connection with the SEC X account hack, which falsely announced Bitcoin ETF approval. Prosecutors seek $50,000 in forfeiture, while Council awaits sentencing in May. The case highlights security gaps that allowed the high-profile breach to occur.

The post Alabama Man Pleads Guilty to SEC X Account Hack and Fake Bitcoin ETF Post appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Deutsche Digital Assets Expands European Presence with New Paris Office
item.description:

The post Deutsche Digital Assets Expands European Presence with New Paris Office appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Apple Patches Actively Exploited iOS Zero-Day CVE-2025-24200 in Emergency Update
item.description:
Apple on Monday released out-of-band security updates to address a security flaw in iOS and iPadOS that it said has been exploited in the wild.
Assigned the CVE identifier CVE-2025-24200, the vulnerability has been described as an authorization issue that could make it possible for a malicious actor to disable USB Restricted Mode on a locked device as part of a cyber physical attack.
